Preventive measures: Avoid touching your eyes, nose or mouth
Stay more than arm’s length from persons affected with flu
Cover your mouth and nose with a handkerchief or tissue when you cough or sneeze
Drink plenty of fluids and eat nutritious food
Do’s Don’ts: Wear mask and avoid crowded places Shake hands or use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer Spit in public Eat in groups Take antibiotics or other medicines without consulting a doctor
